page_content:
Vysiion Ltd

Cross Domain Security Zone

Vysiion Cross Domain Security Zone enables consumers to securely transfer data between the Assured OFFICIAL (formerly IL2) cloud platform and the Elevated OFFICIAL (formerly IL3) cloud platform using CESG approved cross domain security patterns.

Features

  • Self-managed option supports complex and varied use-cases
  • Managed option supports simple and inspectable traffic flows
  • Optimised for OFFICIAL - designed for OFFICIAL and OFFICIAL-SENSITIVE
  • Green; based in UK facilities which offer market leading efficiency
  • Managed by SC cleared staff
  • Ensure you are meeting the required levels of solution compliance
  • Connection between Official (IL2) and Official Sensitive (IL3)

Benefits

  • Choose the solution that best fits your need
  • Supports and enables the Government digital strategy
  • Better management of data with differing security classifications
  • Support for organisations with legacy security requirements
  • Secure method of transferring data between domains

Pricing

£500.00 per instance per month

  • Excluding VAT
  • Minimum contract period: Month
